title: edgycorner
author: edgycorner
created_time: July 09, 2022, 09:02:20 PMLast edit: July 09, 2022, 11:40:09 PM by edgycorner
content: I can't access preev.com, I get the following page every time:Is it going to come back or is it done for good  I will miss its simple design and quick access to bitcoin prices without going through bs ads

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Yeah, it's a known problem (Preev.com - DNS hosting service has expired.)Perhaps they could come back as some in the thread said that they have seen it happen beforeIn a meantime, try out alternatives like https://bitsusd.com/

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: The topic is already opened for discussion here : Preev.com - DNS hosting service has expired.Please use Search option before posting. The topic was already posted in the same sub-board.The comment above already has answered your question.No need to duplicate topics. Please lock this one.Note : I opened a topic two years ago about the same issue : Calculator preev is down?It becomes regular as i see.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.created_time: July 09, 2022, 11:04:51 PMLast edit: July 09, 2022, 11:25:37 PM by coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: edgycorner on July 09, 2022, 09:02:20 PMI can't access preev.com, I get the following page every time:Is it going to come back or is it done for good  I will miss its simple design and quick access to bitcoin prices without going through bs adsI'm also using this simple tool for price comparison and this is the first online tool I've used it's been online for many years I wonder why the webmaster forgot or just let his subscription to his provider expire.Depending on the host he is using, hosting providers usually have a backup of up to 30 days so he will have up to that number of days since his expiration, to pay his provider and launch the site again, the domain is still up untilQuote Expires On:2025-01-01

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: Quote from: coupable on July 09, 2022, 10:12:25 PMThe topic is already opened for discussion here : Preev.com - DNS hosting service has expired.Please use Search option before posting. The topic was already posted in the same sub-board.The comment above already has answered your question.No need to duplicate topics. Please lock this one.oh well, my bad.I did a search before writing it but nothing turned up. https://i.imgur.com/xcHhktJ.pngNo sense in keeping two topics open about the same thing. I will lock this one up.QuoteNote : I opened a topic two years ago about the same issue : Calculator preev is down?It becomes regular as i see.Seems like they face problems with their hosting provider on a regular basis since their domain is all paid up until 2025.Quote from: coin-investor on July 09, 2022, 11:04:51 PMQuote from: edgycorner on July 09, 2022, 09:02:20 PMI can't access preev.com, I get the following page every time:Is it going to come back or is it done for good  I will miss its simple design and quick access to bitcoin prices without going through bs adsI'm also using this simple tool for price comparison and this is the first online tool I've used it's been online for many years I wonder why the webmaster forgot or just let his subscription to his provider expire.Depending on the host he is using, hosting providers usually have a backup of up to 30 days so he will have up to that number of days since his expiration, to pay his provider and launch the site again, the domain is still up untilQuote Expires On:2025-01-01yea, preev is really cool. Been checking the price of bitcoin on preev ever since I got to know about bitcoins(2013?) and it has become a habit now. Even while taking a dump, I would open preev.com from habit lolLocking this thread
